name: Edmund L. GOLDSBOROUGH, Maxwell Levinson, Elizabeth McManus and Inez Scheerle, Appellants, v. DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION OF the COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania and Lower Merion School District
docket_number: No. 108; Appeal Nos. 108 E.D. Appeal Dkt. 1989

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: Edmund L. GOLDSBOROUGH, Maxwell Levinson, Elizabeth McManus and Inez Scheerle, Appellants, v. DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION OF the COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania and Lower Merion School District.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Orders affirmed.
McDERMOTT, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Alan F. Candor, Narberth, for appellants.
Gregory E. Dunlap, Ernest L. Helling, Harrisburg, for Dept. of Educ.
Charles Potash, Blue Bell, Jeffrey A. Lutsky, Philadelphia, Kenneth A. Roos, Blue Bell, for Lower Merion School Dist.

casebody.head_matter:
599 A.2d 645
Edmund L. GOLDSBOROUGH, Maxwell Levinson, Elizabeth McManus and Inez Scheerle, Appellants, v. DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION OF the COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania and Lower Merion School District.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 21, 1991.
Decided Nov. 22, 1991.
Reargument Denied June 1, 1992.
Alan F. Candor, Narberth, for appellants.
